content.raw:
Sometimes when I apply a texture to a wall that's been painted a color, the wall turns the original color of the material, then when I hover the mouse away, it turns the right color. For example:

1. Add a wall
2. Paint the wall orange
3. Add the "tiles" texture and don't move the mouse
4. The wall will appear white, with tiles. Hover the mouse away and it will turn orange.
